News.Title: Sintercom India Secures 1.53 Billion Rupee Contract
News.Summary: Sintercom India has been awarded a contract valued at 1.53 billion rupees (approximately $18.5 million USD). This significant deal represents a major business development for the company, potentially boosting its revenue and market position.
